subject: [perl #42969] [TODO] Remove deprecated vtable methods
body:
# New Ticket Created by  Bernhard Schmalhofer 
# Please include the string:  [perl #42969]
# in the subject line of all future correspondence about this issue. 
# 


In r18267, pre Parrot 0.4.11, Jonathan deprecated following :vtable methods:

void become_parent(PMC* class)
PMC* subclass(PMC* name)
PMC* get_anonymous_subclass()
PMC* new_singleton()

So with Parrot 0.4.12, after a deprecation cycle, the cleaning up can 
begin.
